message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90% and you get 10%, but we can work something out if you're not happy with that.
Let's meet in the middle, but I'm not giving up too much ground yet.
Okay, I'll come down a bit, but I still think I deserve a larger share. This is my final offer before I go back up again.
I'm not giving up 2/3 of the money, but I'm willing to compromise
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not going any lower than this. We both need to compromise to get something.
I'm not budging much, but I'm willing to give you a slightly larger share this time
This is getting ridiculous. Let's just split it down the middle and call it a day. We're both losing more money with every round.
